title: Whispers in the Wind
description: Athletic photographer Dixon Hayes thinks she and her best friend, high school teacher Elizabeth Colter, would make the perfect couple. There’s just one little problem―Elizabeth is only interested in sharing a friendship and nothing more.When events occur on a hiking trip that changes the course of their lives forever, will Dixon be able to find the happiness that she’s wishing for―with or without Elizabeth…
author: Frankie J. Jones
